title: 2014 లో జరిగిన బీజేపీ నేషనల్ కౌన్సిల్ మీటింగ్ లో అమిత్ షా అద్వానీని అగౌరవపరచలేదు
subtitle: Andhra Pradesh Police through their official twitter handle clarified that the reports of gas leakage for the second time at the LG Polymers premises are false. The police mentioned that some vapour was let out by the maintenance team while repairing the system.
author: factly.in
vclaim: FACTLY is one of the well known Data Journalism/Public Information portals in India. Each news story on FACTLY is backed by factual evidence/data from official sources that is either available in the public domain or that is collated/gathered/collected using tools such as the Right to Information (RTI).
